title: i have a problem
body: when i start lol i get this Error: api-ms-win-crt-runtime-l1-1-0.dll is missing

replies.body: this doesn't  appear when i load into a match it appears when i start the client before logging  into my account

If this is happening while trying to load a match then you may have a failing driver or missing file that can't render the game.  I suggest using the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to help update your drivers and get this fixed up!  Let me know if you have any questions.
